name: Pizza
ingredients:
Thin crust dough
pizza sauce
yellow bell pepper
red bell pepper
garlic clove
olive oil
Parmesan cheese
cornmeal
dried oregano
steps: Make the pizza dough.
Preheat your pizza oven to 500°F.
Make the pizza sauce.
Prepare the toppings.
When the oven is ready, dust a pizza peel with cornmeal.
Spread the pizza sauce over the dough. Sprinkle with the vegetables, drained capers, and Parmesan cheese.
Bake the pizza until the cheese and crust are nicely browned, about 5 to 7 minutes in the oven.

name: Creamy Chicken Pasta
steps: Combine the half and half, chicken broth, and seasonings in a large measuring cup with a spout and set aside.

Slice the chicken in half lengthwise to create 2-4 thinner slices.  Pat each side dry. Season with salt/pepper and Italian seasoning. Sprinkle each side of the chicken with flour and rub it over the surface.
Boiling water for the pasta.Add the wine, butter and garlic.Add the chicken broth/half and half mixture in small splashes, stirring continuously.
Salt the boiling water and add the pasta. Cook until no more than al dente.

name: Chicken Wings
steps: Mix all ingredients
Marinate 2 hours
Fry them

name: Fried Rice
steps: Fry the onion, peas, and carrots until they are tender.
Pour the beaten eggs onto the other side. Use a spatula to scramble the eggs. Mix them together with the veggies.
Add the rice. Combine it with the veggie and egg mixture. Pour the soy sauce on top and stir until it is heated throughout. Garnish with green onions.

name: Spring Rolls
steps: Cook vermicelli noodles in boiling water, for just a few minutes.
Gather all topping ingredients together, including chopped veggies, herbs, cooked shrimp.
Layer 1-2 slices of each veggie, a few shrimp, a few leaves of each herb and a pinch of noodles on the ⅓ of the spring roll that is closest to you.
Fold the sides of the spring roll in over the ingredients, rolling it up like a burrito.

name: Moon Cake
steps: Mix golden syrup, lye water, and vegetable oil accurately in a mixing bowl.
Sieve the flour. Add all at once to the above mixture.
Combine all the ingredients.
Place the dough on a piece of cling wrap. Refrigerate for thirty minutes to let the dough relax.
Fill the yolk with the lotus paste.
Roll the mooncake with your palms to form a ball.
Bake it at the middle rack, 175°C/350°F top and bottom temperature for five minutes or until the surface starts to firm up.

name: Sandwiches
steps: Toast bread
Spread mayonnaise
Place all ingredients on
Secure with tootpicks

name: Vietnamese Caramelized & Braised Catfish
steps: Clean the fish
Add oil to a pan and saute garlic over medium heat.
Layer onion on top, then the fish, evenly spaced.
Add the seasoning & cooking liquid
Add all ingredients
Cook 40 mins

name: Bun Dau Mam Tom
ingredients:
Fresh vermicelli
tofu
pork
cucumbers
lemons
vegetables
shrimp
garlic
ginger
vinegar
rice paper
steps: Add salt to pork, shrimp
Cut tofu into small squares and then fry it
Wash vegetable

name: Spicy Beef & Pork Noodle Soup(Bun Bo Hue)
ingredients:
beef shank
oxtail
pork hocks
Hue style pork sausage
block of pork blood
water
chicken broth
lemongrass
salt
sugar
shrimp paste
fish sauce
shallot
garlic
dried rice noodle
steps: Add all meat to a stock pot and enough water to submerge it, bring to a boil.
Add the meat, broth, lemongrass and onions to the pot and fill with water, boil it, add the seasoning.
